replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 kkk123456321 于 2018-6-13 13:13 编辑 

WARNING: coremods are present:
  AppleCore (AppleCore-mc1.10.2-2.2.0.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! Remove FoamFixAPI (or replace with FoamFixAPI-Lawful) and try again. (foamfix-0.6.1-anarchy.jar)
  FMLPlugin InventoryTweaks-1.62-dev-66.jar)
  IC2core ([IC2]industrialcraft-2-2.6.140-ex110.jar)
  CCLCorePlugin ([IC???]CodeChickenLib-1.10.2-2.5.1.185-universal.jar)
删除foamFixAPI或替换为FoamFixAPI-正确版本，然后再试一次
